directions.text: Add the beer, yeast and sugar in a mixer bowl and rest for 10 mins.
Add the rest of the doug ingredients and mix with a dough hook until dough like.
Grease a 9x13″ pan with olive oil and with oily fingers stretch the dough roughly towards the edges.
Let dough sit for 1 hour and 15 mins.
Simmer all sauce ingredients for 15 mins on medium low.
Push dough up the walls of the pan about a ½″.
Add most of the ingredients on dough then place cheese on top.
Spread sauce over the cheese and some left over ingredients on top of the sauce.
Cool for 5 mins and cut on a cutting board.
